column4: hello. looking for a gnome environment that's stable on a 128mb ram older computer.
xubuntu, was pretty hard on it; the computer was slow when I installed xubuntu on it.
Probably won't find a GNOME environment that's stable with 128mb. I
I'm under the impression XFCE requires 256mb to run well. Perhaps one of the *Box's (OpenBox, Fluxbox) would fit your needs?
